title: Help me with clubs
body: _**Guys after the clubs fixed i got a problem the club ive made before it become disabled and i was it admin i got banned out of it and i'm no longer inside it but what my friends see is that the club still active and i'm the leader of it but in truth i'm not what can i do to get it back please help**_

replies.body:
Hi,

I am having the same issue with my club. Can you look into it too? Thanks. Club name is BuzzBuzz (Buzz)
Your club looks refreshed and good to go, friend.
This should now be resolved.  I took a look for you and all seems well.  Let me know if that's not the case along with the name and tag of your club.

Hi there Porocles! 

I'm currently having this problem, where I am unable to see or access my club "Mad or NaCl" however my friend's tell me I'm still in it, and the leader.
I also have this problem although I'm still the leader and my friends see me in it I don't see it in my club listings, club name is Craig n Co (CNCO)
